name: Roll of the dice (Er2ch)
description:
Roll of the dice by Er2

Made for GMTK Jam 2022

Theme: Roll of the dice

Source code.

This is an RPG game which is controlled by random actions given by dice.

This game is endless until you are dead.

Enemies has own HP and armor. Walls are helping to reduce damage.

Actions:

- TNT (fire internally) - Boom all of enemies. Reduces its HP and armor.

- Shield - Reduce damage from enemies.

- Skip (deny sign) - Prevent enemies from attack.

- Skull - Kill random enemy.

- Sword - Attack all enemies.

- Wall - Build a wall which is reduces damage (wall can be destroyed).

You can also see these actions in icons in the 0 level.
